Package org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.hadoop.als

Class Summary
DatasetSplitter Split a recommendation dataset into a training and a test set
FactorizationEvaluator Measures the root-mean-squared error of a rating matrix factorization against a test set.
FactorizationEvaluator.PredictRatingsMapper

PredictionMapper a multithreaded mapper that loads the feature matrices U and M into memory.
